# Introduction

This script generates the maps for the global atlas of distant water fisheries subsidies. 

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
# Packages
library(sf)
library(tidyverse)

# Document options
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

# Section 1: Maps by Flag State

```{r cars}
eez_fao <- read_sf(dsn = here::here("data", "shapefiles", "eez_v10_fao_combined_simple"), layer="eez_v10_fao_combined_simple") # Ocean map of EEZ boundaries and fao regions
world <- read_sf(dsn = here::here("data", "shapefiles", "world_happy_180"), layer="world_happy_180") # Simplified world map

test_map <- ggplot()+
  geom_sf(data = eez_fao)+
  geom_sf(data = world)

```
